sections.title: In The Present - 2023
sections.description: Here is a walk-through of my first video game creation, detailing the game's conception, the underlying narrative, and the challenges I faced.

sections.title: Flightless - 2024
sections.description: My 2nd game project, 'The Flightless Journey', is a narrative-driven adventure game that explores the life of a pigeon navigating through a city. This project showcases my growth in game design and storytelling.

sections.title: Web Development
sections.description: Embark on an journey through my web development process, beginning with the fundamentals of HTML to learning backend techniques.

sections.title: Animations Project
sections.description: A short process on the animation project I created for my Media Arts minor. This was my first hands on animation ever!

sections.title: Photography Project
sections.description: Explore my photography project where I captured the different shot types the through my lens, focusing on composition, lighting, and storytelling.
